Chief Oladipo "Ladi" Jadesimi bụ onye ọchụnta ego mmanụ Naijiria na onye guzobere Lagos Deep Offshore Logistics Base, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche.
Oladipo Jadesimi gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na King's College, Lagos
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford na 1966 na M.A
degrees na Jurisprudence, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na Coopers na Lybrand na London
Ọ bụ onye otu Institute of Chartered Accountants na England na Wales (F.C.A.)

Ọ bụ onye mmekọ na Arthur Andersen Nigeria, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ego na-enweghị onwe ya, na nnukwu onye na-etinye ego na Niger Delta Oil Company. A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke Niger Delta Exploration and Production PLC na 2010 wee bụrụ onye isi oche nke Board na June 21, 2016. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-abụghị onye isi nke First City Monument Bank site na 1983 ruo 2011. Jadesimi bụ onye guzobere Lagos Offshore Logistics Base ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche.

Chief Jadesimi lụrụ Alero Okotie-Eboh, onye mgbasa ozi na nwa nwanyị nke Chief Festus Okotie-Eboh. Nwa ha nwanyị, Amy Jadesimi, bụ onye isi ọrụ nke LADOL. Jadesimi na onye Bekee na-elekọta mmadụ Suzanna McQuiston nwere mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego na London na 1980s
Site na mmekọrịta a, ọ mụrụ Emma Thynn, Marchioness nke Bath.
